title: Best of The Herd: 11/26/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/26/2018
description:
Colin would like to see more evidence of why Aaron Rodgers is in the "G.O.A.T." conversation because he is not showing it when it comes to wins and losses. He talks about Andrew Luck being way ahead of Patrick Mahomes in the MVP conversation. Plus, Hall of Famer and Undisputed co-host Shannon Sharpe comes in studio to tell Colin that Tom Brady has had a bad season so far and nobody is talking about. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Colin would like to see more evidence of why Aaron Rodgers is in the "G.O.A.T." conversation because he is not showing it when it comes to wins and losses. He talks about Andrew Luck being way ahead of Patrick Mahomes in the MVP conversation. Plus, Hall of Famer and Undisputed co-host Shannon Sharpe comes in studio to tell Colin that Tom Brady has had a bad season so far and nobody is talking about. Presented by Perky Jerky.
